MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 03-NOV-2020 13:45.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the TD5 postcode area of Kelso. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.45am to carry out a repair on the overhead line network located near to Spylaw and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.15am on Tuesday 3rd November 2020.
